item.description:
Please bring pencil/paper and your copy of The Artist's Way.
If you have a small piece of creative work you want to share, we will make time in the first 15-30 minutes for you.
item.why: We are beginning a new cycle starting with Chapters 1-2 of The Artist's Way. Please come to the meetup having read the Basic Tools, as well as Chapters 1 and 2. See you soon!
item.name: FRESH START SPRING 2011: THE ARTIST'S WAY BEGIN CHAPTERS 1-2!!
